string.text: Halt, who is this!? What were you doing there? I wouldn't recommend lying.
My name is Savannah, freelance stalker. I had a partner with me, Borland. He got out before I did. Skidan, the trader from Cordon showed us the way to the X5 lab.
You two are idiots. And so is Skidan. Your partner's got severe poisoning. Must have been gassed. And there's no guarantee you didn't ingest it, too. It's toxic gas, why are you dumbasses in there?
It's not so poisonous as long as we're still alive.
If you live till tomorrow at least, you're lucky as hell. Nobody knows what the gas is, but every time it's killed a digger. They get out alive, then an hour later they die. In terrible agony.
Did they all die?
One of them seems to be alive, but nobody knows how he did it. If you can find him, you can help yourself and your friend Borland.
Where do we find this digger survivor?
Hell if I know. Somewhere. At the junkyard.
See ya.
I don't feel so good, Sawan. I think we've been breathing some special shit in the underground. I've had two whole army first-aid kits pumped into me, but it's no use. I'm getting worse and worse.

I know, Borland, I feel like shit too. But the longshoreman said there's a digger who's been dealing with this poisoning. You wouldn't happen to know about that, would you? Where can I find him on the Dump?
I heard there's a rubbish heap near the tanks. Well, I heard it's in that area somewhere. A lot of people have tried, but no one's found his lair.
We don't have much choice. If you can't go, I'll find it myself.
Come on, you're our only hope. But there's no time left, I'm afraid the Zone is going to eat me. Goodbye, maybe I won't see you again.
Hold on, I'll be right back.
Shroud, I knew you'd keep your word.
All right, Borland, here's the antidote.
Thank you.
You just get yourself up, and I'll have a word with the local authorities.

You smell that, Savannah? A blowout of unprecedented power is coming. A super-blowout. The scientists have issued a warning. The only place to hide from it is in the dungeons of the Bar. If you don't want to die, follow us to the Bar for cover. Decide now. If not, we're closing off the Junkyard Bar, so the mutants don't come after us. There's no survivors here in the junkyard.
The Bar is the only place to survive? Are you sure?
You don't joke about that sort of thing. If you've noticed, the dump is already deserted. Everyone who cares about life has already evacuated.
How far is Bara from here? Can we make it? I don't know the way. It's my first time here. Borland, my partner, probably knows the way...
No time to talk. Sensors are going off the scale. Make up your mind. Are you coming with us?
Yes.
Hurry up, it's about to start! We'll wait for another Quad and follow you. In short, on the road all the way and on the run. Let's go!
Good luck.
